scripts.seed-db: npx knex migrate:rollback --all && npx knex migrate:latest && npx knex seed:run
scripts.create-db: docker exec -it capstone-db-1 psql -U postgres -c "CREATE DATABASE capstone_db;"
scripts.drop-db: docker exec -it capstone-db-1 psql -U postgres -c "DROP DATABASE capstone_db;"
scripts.reset-db: docker compose up -d && docker compose stop && docker compose start && npm run drop-db && npm run create-db && npm run seed-db
